title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Afghanistan 2024
summary: Overall GDP in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
GDP in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2007 to 2012, and finally roughly constant from 2012 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2009 and 2010.
Maximum GDP in billion U.S. dollars, about 20.62 was reported at Year 2014
Minimum GDP in billion U.S. dollars about 8.56 was reached at Year 2007
min_summary: In general GDP in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
GDP in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2007 to 2012, and finally roughly constant from 2012 to 2018.
